text: The problem with LeetCode questionsâ€¦.. LeetCode questions are great for sharpening problem-solving skills, but real-world coding also demands collaboration, scalable design, and handling complex codebases. Hereâ€™s a more effective prep approach: â¡ï¸Understand Algorithms Donâ€™t just memorizeâ€”grasp how they work. Know, for example, the difference between quicksort and mergesort. â¡ï¸Identify Patterns in Problems Spot recurring themes. For instance, in tree problems, consider depth-first vs. breadth-first search. â¡ï¸Iterate and Optimize After solving, ask yourself, â€œCan I make this faster?â€ Focus on improving time complexity with better algorithms. â¡ï¸ Practice with Mock Interviews Simulate real interviews with mocks to get feedback on your approach. Platforms like Preplaced connects you with experienced software engineers who will provide constructive feedback on your approach and performance.

Here are some key points to consider: ğŸ­. ğ— ğ—²ğ—®ğ—»ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ğ—³ğ˜‚ğ—¹ ğ—ªğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—¸: Seek fulfillment and purpose in your tasks and contributions. Set boundaries, prioritize self-care, and make time for hobbies, relationships, and activities outside of work. ğŸ°. ğ—¦ğ˜‚ğ—½ğ—½ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—² ğ—˜ğ—»ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜: Expect a workplace culture that values diversity, inclusion, and employee well-being. Seek out organizations that prioritize a supportive and inclusive environment where you can thrive. ğŸ±. ğ—™ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—¿ ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—ºğ—½ğ—²ğ—»ğ˜€ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: Advocate for fair compensation and benefits for your contributions. Ensure that you are fairly rewarded for your skills, experience, and the value you bring to the organization. ğŸ². ğ—”ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—»ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—µ ğ—©ğ—®ğ—¹ğ˜‚ğ—²ğ˜€: Choose employers whose values align with yours. A sense of alignment with the organization's mission and culture can enhance job satisfaction and fulfillment. ğŸ³. ğ—™ğ—¹ğ—²ğ˜…ğ—¶ğ—¯ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ˜ğ˜† ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—”ğ˜‚ğ˜ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—¼ğ—ºğ˜†: Look for opportunities for flexible work arrangements that accommodate your needs and preferences. Having autonomy in how you work can contribute to a better work-life balance and overall job satisfaction. ğŸ´. ğ—–ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—²ğ—¿ ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: Seek opportunities for advancement and growth within the organization. Set goals for your career progression and actively pursue opportunities for development and advancement. ğŸµ. ğ— ğ—²ğ—®ğ—»ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ğ—³ğ˜‚ğ—¹ ğ—¥ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»ğ˜€ğ—µğ—¶ğ—½ğ˜€: Build meaningful connections with colleagues and mentors. Cultivate a supportive network of peers and mentors who can offer guidance, support, and camaraderie throughout your career journey. ğŸ­ğŸ¬. ğ—Ÿğ—¶ğ—³ğ—² ğ—¢ğ˜‚ğ˜ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—±ğ—² ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—ªğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—¸: Remember that a job is just one aspect of your identity. Prioritize hobbies, relationships, and personal interests to maintain a balanced and fulfilling life outside of work. By managing expectations and prioritizing holistic well-being, we can create fulfilling careers that complement our overall lifestyle. Let's strive for balance and fulfillment in both our professional and personal lives! ğŸ’¼âœ¨

ğ’ğ¨ğ¦ğğ­ğ¢ğ¦ğğ¬, ğ–ğâ€™ğ«ğ ğ‰ğ®ğ¬ğ­ ğğ¨ğ­ ğ‹ğ®ğœğ¤ğ²!!ğŸ€ We have all been in this situation - ğ°ğğ¥ğ¥ ğ©ğ«ğğ©ğšğ«ğğ ğ­ğ¨ ğ©ğğ«ğŸğğœğ­ğ¢ğ¨ğ§, ğœğ¨ğ§ğŸğ¢ğğğ§ğ­ ğ¨ğŸ ğ¨ğ®ğ« ğšğ›ğ¢ğ¥ğ¢ğ­ğ¢ğğ¬ ğšğ§ğ ğ«ğğšğğ² ğ­ğ¨ ğ©ğšğ¬ğ¬ ğ­ğ¡ğšğ­ ğ¢ğ§ğ­ğğ«ğ¯ğ¢ğğ°. However, there are times when despite our best efforts things may not go as planned. And you know what? This is fine. ğŸ˜Š Luck plays a big part in the outcome of any interview. At times, everything falls perfectly into place and at other instances it does not even when you did everything right. In reality the process is unpredictable. So if you didnâ€™t get the job donâ€™t beat yourself up about it. Instead give yourself credit for showing up, learning something new and making an effort. Every interview is progress no matter what happens on result day. Remember that this is not your end point. It forms one part of a wider picture. Keep moving forward, stay strong and believe your time will come. Because sometimes all you need is for the right opportunity to meet the right moment â€“ so believe in yourself and trust the process. Maintain a positive outlook, remain focused on your goals whilst never forgetting to rejoice even on minor accomplishments along the way ğŸŒŸ

Is Your IDE Making You Forgetful? ğŸ¤” Let's be honestâ€”IDEs and auto-suggestions make coding faster and easier. But there's a downside: the more we rely on them, the more we might forget the basics. Imagine this: you're in an interview, no IDE to help, and suddenly you canâ€™t remember the syntax for something simple. Itâ€™s a tough spot to be in, but it can happen if we donâ€™t practice coding on our own sometimes. So hereâ€™s a thought: try coding without the shortcuts now and then. Itâ€™ll help you remember more and feel confident in interviews. Keep those coding skills sharp! ğŸ’ªâœ¨

Here are three essential things you should have in-hand: 1ï¸âƒ£ ğ—•ğ˜‚ğ—¶ğ—¹ğ—± ğ—¬ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¿ ğ—¥ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜‚ğ—ºğ—²: If you haven't crafted your resume yet, now is the time. Opportunities often arise when least expected, and having a polished resume ready can make all the difference. 2ï¸âƒ£ ğ—šğ—¶ğ˜ğ—›ğ˜‚ğ—¯ ğ—¥ğ—²ğ—½ğ—¼ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ˜† ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—·ğ—²ğ—°ğ˜ğ˜€: Don't keep your projects confined to your local system. Push them to a GitHub repository! Not only does this ensure their safety, but it also allows you to easily showcase them by including project links in your resume, boosting your visibility to potential employers. 3ï¸âƒ£ ğ—§ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—»ğ˜€ğ—°ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ—½ğ˜ğ˜€ ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: Have you gathered your signed transcripts from your institute? If not, make sure to do so. Alternatively, if your institute provides unsigned transcripts online, download them allâ€”from your first semester to the presentâ€”and store them in a secure folder. Many companies require transcripts (semester grade sheets) when you start applying for roles, so having them readily available is crucial. Remember, preparation is key to seizing opportunities and setting yourself up for success. Start now and stay ahead of the game!

Last year, I gave 4 interviews And cracked 3 of themâ€”Flipkart, Oracle, and Confluent âœŒï¸ I was genuinely surprised and needed some time to decide, but I ultimately chose Oracle over the others. Here's what influenced my decision: â¤ Technical Alignment: My internship at Google showed me how much I enjoy working with Java, and I wanted to continue that. Oracleâ€™s focus on Java projects seemed like the best place for my growth. â¤ Insights from seniors: I reached out to seniors from both Oracle and Flipkart to understand their work cultures. Their advice showed me that Oracle offered the technical depth and work-life balance I wanted. Iâ€™m really glad I took the time to connect with my seniors Their insights opened my eyes to aspects I hadnâ€™t thought about. If youâ€™re trying to figure out your career path, I recommend you connect with senior professionals in your target companies. âœ”

Job milna sirf skill ka game nahi, yeh mental strength ka bhi test hai. ğ€ğšğ£ ğ£ğ¨ ğ­ğ¨ğ®ğ ğ¡ ğ¥ğšğ  ğ«ğšğ¡ğš ğ¡ğšğ¢, ğ¤ğšğ¥ ğ°ğšğ¡ğ¢ ğ­ğ®ğ¦ğ¡ğ ğ©ğ«ğ¨ğ®ğ ğŸğğğ¥ ğ¤ğšğ«ğšğ²ğğ ğš. ğŸš€ ğ€ğ©ğ§ğ¢ ğ¬ğ­ğ¨ğ«ğ² ğ¤ğ¡ğ®ğ ğ¥ğ¢ğ¤ğ¡ğ¨, ğğ®ğ¬ğ«ğ¨ğ§ ğ¤ğ ğğ±ğ©ğğœğ­ğšğ­ğ¢ğ¨ğ§ğ¬ ğ©ğ ğ¦ğšğ­ ğœğ¡ğšğ¥ğ¨!
Biggest fear? Burnout. Greatest threat? A toxic work culture that normalizes it. Letâ€™s prioritize well-being over deadlines, because sustainable success isnâ€™t built on exhaustion.

2017 ğ—¡ğ—˜ğ—˜ğ—§ ğ˜ğ—¼ğ—½ğ—½ğ—²ğ—¿ Navdeep Singh Dies by ğ—¦ğ˜‚ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—±ğ—², No Note Found Sometimes I feel that being less intelligent is much better than being highly intelligent and a topper. People not understanding your worth seems better than them expecting you to be a star. Often, suicides occur because of societal pressure and expectations. He was not the only one who felt this pressure; each of us has faced similar situations at some point. Why is there no place for a person to go back to? Why can't we take a step back or leave if we need to? Why is it important to constantly repeat past successes? Even our own family and relatives start questioning us if we don't continue to excel. These tragic events are so depressing and highlight the severe pressure faced by many individuals. The recent suicides, including that of the IIT Guwahati student and NEET 2017 topper Navdeep Singh, underscore the urgent need for a supportive environment where mental health is prioritized.

ğˆğ¬ ğ²ğ¨ğ®ğ« ğ«ğğ¬ğ®ğ¦ğ ğ§ğ¨ğ­ ğ ğğ­ğ­ğ¢ğ§ğ  ğ§ğ¨ğ­ğ¢ğœğğ ğ›ğ² ğ­ğ¡ğ ğ¢ğ§ğ­ğğ«ğ¯ğ¢ğğ°ğğ«? Hereâ€™s how to enhance it and make it ğ€ğ“ğ’-ğŸğ«ğ¢ğğ§ğğ¥ğ². In today's competitive job market, ensuring your resume is optimized for ğ€ğ©ğ©ğ¥ğ¢ğœğšğ§ğ­ ğ“ğ«ğšğœğ¤ğ¢ğ§ğ  ğ’ğ²ğ¬ğ­ğğ¦ğ¬ (ğ€ğ“ğ’) is crucial. An ATS helps recruiters filter candidates efficiently, but if your resume isn't formatted correctly, it may never get noticed by the hiring manager. To increase your chances of getting noticed, follow these 6 essential ATS hacks ğ”ğ¬ğ ğ‘ğğ¥ğğ¯ğšğ§ğ­ ğŠğğ²ğ°ğ¨ğ«ğğ¬: Tailor your resume with keywords from the job description, incorporating them naturally in your summary, skills, and experience sections. Avoid keyword stuffing! ğ‚ğ¥ğğšğ« ğ’ğğœğ­ğ¢ğ¨ğ§ ğ‡ğğšğğ¢ğ§ğ ğ¬: Label your sections clearly with headings like "Professional Experience," "Education," and "Skills" to ensure the ATS can easily identify and parse your information. ğ‚ğ¡ğ¨ğ¨ğ¬ğ ğš ğ’ğ¢ğ¦ğ©ğ¥ğ ğ…ğ¨ğ«ğ¦ğšğ­: Stick to a clean, chronological format. Avoid using graphics, tables, or multiple columns, as these can confuse the ATS. Use standard fonts like Arial or Calibri. ğ…ğ¨ğœğ®ğ¬ ğ¨ğ§ ğ‘ğğ¥ğğ¯ğšğ§ğ­ ğ‚ğ¨ğ§ğ­ğğ§ğ­: Highlight your achievements and responsibilities using bullet points. Ensure each job entry includes the company name, location, job title, and dates of employment. ğğ«ğ¨ğ¨ğŸğ«ğğšğ ğ“ğ¡ğ¨ğ«ğ¨ğ®ğ ğ¡ğ¥ğ²: Spelling and grammar errors can prevent the ATS from accurately reading your resume. Double-check your document or use an online tool for error detection. ğ‚ğ¨ğ§ğ¬ğ¢ğ¬ğ­ğğ§ğœğ² ğ¢ğ¬ ğŠğğ²: Use consistent formatting for dates and other elements. For example, stick to MM/YYYY or "Month Year" formats for dates. By following these tips, you can increase the likelihood that your resume makes it through the ATS and gets noticed by recruiters. Let's get those resumes to the top of the pile!

ğ—–ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—¯ğ—¿ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğŸ­ ğ˜†ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¿ ğ—®ğ˜ ğ—¢ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—°ğ—¹ğ—² ğŸ‰ ğ—ªğ—µğ—®ğ˜ ğ—® ğ—·ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—»ğ—²ğ˜† ğ—¶ğ˜'ğ˜€ ğ—¯ğ—²ğ—²ğ—»! ğ—™ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—º ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—»ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—®ğ˜ ğ—šğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—¹ğ—² ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—³ğ—®ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—·ğ—²ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»ğ˜€, ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—»ğ—¼ğ˜„ ğ˜ğ—µğ—¿ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—®ğ˜€ ğ—®ğ—» ğ— ğ—§ğ—¦ ğ—®ğ˜ ğ—¢ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—°ğ—¹ğ—². Here are some key lessons that helped me crack these PBCs: ğŸŸ¢ Contributing to open-source isn't optional anymore. My GitHub opened doors that my resume couldn't. ğŸŸ¢ Keep a 'failure journal'. Tracking my interview feedback helped me spot patterns and improve faster. ğŸŸ¢ Mock interviews are game-changers. I did 10+ mocks before my Oracle interview. These strategies made a huge difference, but the journey was still challenging. Looking back, I realize I could have grown much faster with proper guidance. If you're on a similar journey, consider connecting with seniors who can guide you 1:1. Platforms like Preplaced connects you with seasoned tech professionals who offer guidance tailored to your goals.

ğŸš¨ ğ—™ğ—¹ğ—®ğ˜ ğ—¦ğ—°ğ—®ğ—º ğ—”ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—™ğ—¿ğ—²ğ˜€ğ—µğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€ ğ— ğ—¼ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—›ğ˜†ğ—±ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—¯ğ—®ğ—±/ğ—•ğ—®ğ—»ğ—´ğ—®ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—²/ğ——ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—µğ—¶ ğŸš¨ Hey everyone, I want to bring your attention to a scam targeting newcomers searching for flats or flatmates in cities like Hyderabad, Bangalore, and Delhi. Scammers are infiltrating online groups and posting seemingly amazing deals for flats at unbelievably low prices. Hereâ€™s how the scam typically unfolds: ğ—Ÿğ˜‚ğ—°ğ—¿ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—² ğ—£ğ—¼ğ˜€ğ˜ğ˜€: Scammers post about a room available in a decent flat at a very low cost. This attracts a lot of interest. ğ—™ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—² ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—»ğ˜ğ—®ğ—°ğ˜ğ˜€: They provide a number for someone who supposedly already stays in the flat. This person will tell you many people are interested and you need to prebook by paying a monthâ€™s rent. ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—² ğ—§ğ—®ğ—°ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—°ğ˜€: Overwhelmed by the fear of missing out, many people end up paying the rent upfront without verifying. ğ—›ğ—¼ğ˜„ ğ˜ğ—¼ ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜ğ—²ğ—°ğ˜ ğ—¬ğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—¹ğ—³: ğ—¡ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—¿ ğ—£ğ—®ğ˜† ğ—ªğ—¶ğ˜ğ—µğ—¼ğ˜‚ğ˜ ğ—©ğ—¶ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´: Always visit the flat in person before making any payment. ğ—©ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ—³ğ˜† ğ——ğ—¼ğ—°ğ˜‚ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ğ˜€: Ensure you receive and verify all necessary documents. ğ—šğ—²ğ˜ ğ—® ğ—–ğ—¼ğ—»ğ˜ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—°ğ˜: Donâ€™t pay anything until you have a legally binding contract. Stay safe and donâ€™t let scammers take advantage of your excitement. Share this post to spread awareness!
